scripts.clean: rm -rf node_modules && rm -rf android/build && rm -rf ios/build && rm -rf $TMPDIR/react-* && watchman watch-del-all && npm cache clean --force
scripts.android:release: npm run clean:android && npm run android:build:aab
scripts.ios:build: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Hula.xcworkspace -scheme Hula -configuration Release -sdk iphoneos -derivedDataPath build
scripts.ios:archive: cd ios && xcodebuild -workspace Hula.xcworkspace -scheme Hula -configuration Release -archivePath build/Hula.xcarchive archive
scripts.ios:export: cd ios && xcodebuild -exportArchive -archivePath build/Hula.xcarchive -exportPath build/Release -exportOptionsPlist exportOptions.plist
scripts.ios:release: npm run clean:ios && npm run ios:archive && npm run ios:export
scripts.release:android: npm run version:patch && npm run android:release
scripts.release:ios: npm run version:patch && npm run ios:release
scripts.release:both: npm run version:patch && npm run android:release && npm run ios:release
